metadata.name: Visual Studio Code Tunnel Remote File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of file by the "node.exe" process in the ".vscode-server" directory. Could be a sign of remote file creation via VsCode tunnel feature

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\servers\\stable-')) AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\server\\node.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\.vscode-server\\data\\user\\history\\')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of file by the "node.exe" process in the ".vscode-server" directory. Could be a sign of remote file creation via VsCode tunnel feature

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
